report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-29246 Microsoft Azure RTOS USBX Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-29246 Microsoft Azure RTOS USBX Vulnerability
text: Azure RTOS USBX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the function DFU upload. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.
